forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low -2C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 28F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of wintry precipitation in the evening. Then mainly snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix early. Precipitation will change to a mixture of rain and freezing rain for the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of winter precipitation in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and freezing rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low around 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
